Method Detail

sum

public static <T> Money sum(java.util.Collection<T> collection,
                            java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                            java.lang.String property,
                            java.util.Currency currency)
Iterates a collection, and sums the Money elements contained in the specified property of each object. Nulls are excluded from the addition.

Type Parameters:
T - Type of elements in the collection.
Parameters:
collection - Collection to iterate.
clazz - Type of elements in the collection.
property - Name of the property that contains the money element.
currency - Currency of the money elements.
Returns:
Returns the sum.

sum

public static <T> Money sum(java.util.Collection<T> collection,
                            java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                            java.lang.String property,
                            java.util.Currency currency,
                             condition)
Iterates a collection, checks a condition against each element of the collection and if the condition is fulfilled, then sums the Money elements contained in the specified property of each object. Nulls are excluded from the addition.

Type Parameters:
T - Type of elements in the collection.
Parameters:
collection - Collection to iterate.
clazz - Type of elements in the collection.
property - Name of the property that contains the money element.
currency - Currency of the money elements.
condition - Condition to check against each element.
Returns:
Returns the sum.

calcPercentage

public static <T> void calcPercentage(java.util.Collection<T> collection,
                                      java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                      java.math.BigDecimal prc,
                                      java.lang.String amountProperty,
                                      java.lang.String calculatedProperty,
                                      java.util.Currency currency)
Calculates a Money field that is calculated as a percentage of another money field in a collection of elements .
This method iterates a collection and sets a new value to a specified property of each element. The new value is the result of a calculation.
The calculation of each row takes into account the remainder that was created by the rounding that took place during the previous calculation, due to rounding the result to the decimal digits defined by the currency.

Type Parameters:
T - Type of elements in the collection.
Parameters:
collection - Collection with the elements.
clazz - Class of each element in the collection.
prc - Percentage being applied on the calculation.
amountProperty - Name of the property that produces the base amount for the calculation.
calculatedProperty - Name of the property that is filled with the result of the calculation.
currency - Currency.

calcPercentage

public static <T> void calcPercentage(java.util.Collection<T> collection,
                                      java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                      java.lang.String prcProperty,
                                      java.lang.String amountProperty,
                                      java.lang.String calculatedProperty,
                                      java.util.Currency currency)
Calculates a Money field that is calculated as a percentage of another money field in a collection of elements .
This method iterates a collection and sets a new value to a specified property of each element. The new value is the result of a calculation.
The calculation of each row takes into account the remainder that was created by the rounding that took place during the previous calculation, due to rounding the result to the decimal digits defined by the currency.

Type Parameters:
T - Type of elements in the collection.
Parameters:
collection - Collection with the elements.
clazz - Class of each element in the collection.
prcProperty - Name of the property that produces the percentage that is being applied on the calculation.
amountProperty - Name of the property that produces the base amount for the calculation.
calculatedProperty - Name of the property that is filled with the result of the calculation.
currency - Currency.
